properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 30 at 2:11PM PST until February 1 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 25 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 40 kt and seas 14 to 19 feet at 13 seconds
expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, south winds 20 to 25
kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 12 to 17 feet at 15 seconds.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head
OR out 10 NM and Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade
Head OR from 10 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 4 AM Friday to 10 AM PST
Saturday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 AM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST FRIDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM FRIDAY TO 10 AM PST SATURDAY
